text: Brigit's Garden is a and open-air museum in County Galway, Ireland, located to the west of Lough Corrib and dedicated to the goddess Brigid and the Celtic calendar. The founders describe it as "place of connection with nature, beauty and Celtic heritage and a resource for education, reflection and creativity." == References == ==External links== *Official site Category:Archaeological sites in County Galway Category:Museums in County Galway Category:Archaeological museums in the Republic of Ireland Category:Open-air museums in the Republic of Ireland
title: Brigit's Garden
